scenario_text.value:
Minoru’s in favor of exploring. What do you
think of leaving here, Agumon?
What’s keeping you from making up your mind?

Well, if you wanted to go explore, I’d want
to go too. If you wanted to stay, so would I.

*sigh*... Not exactly the kind of answer
I was looking for.

What’s wrong, Takuma? Aren’t you going to
talk with Minoru?
